nodes.text: Cularin Now was an organization that operated during the Clone Wars. Circa 21 BBY, the Kubaz Forg F'lopo recorded footage of the Dark Jedi Raik Muun attacking the patrons of a cantina on the planet Cularin, and he planned to sell the recording to Cularin Now. However, the footage was confiscated by the Office of Peace and Security, a local law enforcement agency.
Cularin Now was created by Matthew Domville and it received a brief mention in Force Contention, the second installment of the Forces of Cularin trilogy of the Living Force role-playing campaign.
